casebody.head_matter:
Emerson, Appellant, v. Allstate Insurance Company et al.
Argued October 10, 1969.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
reargument refused June 2, 1970.
Kenneth W. Behrend, with him Mark B. Aronson, and Behrend & Aronson, for appellant.
Thomas Lerendos, with him Royston, Robb, Leonard, Edgecombe, Miller & Bhorall, for appellee.
Bruce R. Martin, for appellee.
Thomas A. Lazaroff, with him Meyer, Darragh, Buckler, Bebenek <& Eck, for appellee.
April 22, 1970:
